name: Doctor How - A REAL Gameboy Game
name_original: Doctor How - A REAL Gameboy Game
description:
A sample project I made in 2012 with GBDK, a very old framework to create Gameboy ROMs.

You can find the original source code here.

The game is a tribute to Doctor Who TV Series: you have to avoid Daleks and Meteors while Traveling Through Time and Space™

This game runs on a REAL gameboy. You can download the ROM down here.

Controls
  • Arrows: Movement
  • Enter: Start Game
Credits

@Ennacrima - art & graphics

@taisel - the browser gameboy emulator I used for the web version
